value.fullName: Please confirm all shareholders with 10% or more have board representation (if not, a major shareholder exclusion would apply to the quote).
value.label: Please confirm all shareholders with 10% or more have board representation (if not, a major shareholder exclusion would apply to the quote).

value.fullName: Please provide detailed information on how the company intends to maintain its operations for the next 12-18 months. (e.g. full details of fundraising rounds, new sources of revenue, cost-cutting measures, etc)
value.label: Please provide detailed information on how the company intends to maintain its operations for the next 12-18 months. (e.g. full details of fundraising rounds, new sources of revenue, cost-cutting measures, etc)

value.fullName: Please provide the most current year-to-date financials, including the Balance Sheet, Profit and Loss statement, and Cash Flow statement.
value.label: Please provide the most current year-to-date financials, including the Balance Sheet, Profit and Loss statement, and Cash Flow statement.

value.fullName: Please provide a narrative around the losses noted. What remedial actions were taken as a result?
value.label: Please provide a narrative around the losses noted. What remedial actions were taken as a result?

value.fullName: Please provide more details regarding the insured’s upcoming funding plans (e.g. expected type, expected size, any expected changes to board composition, etc.)
value.label: Please provide more details regarding the insured’s upcoming funding plans (e.g. expected type, expected size, any expected changes to board composition, etc.)

value.fullName: Please confirm which, if any, of the following EPL controls the insureds has in place: a full-time HR department, an employee handbook with an at-will statement, annual written performance reviews, and/or harassment training for management every 2 years.
value.label: Please confirm which, if any, of the following EPL controls the insureds has in place: a full-time HR department, an employee handbook with an at-will statement, annual written performance reviews, and/or harassment training for management every 2 years.

value.fullName: Signed and dated version of application submitted, with Founder Shield form attached
value.label: Signed and dated version of application submitted, with Founder Shield form attached

value.fullName: Signed and dated version of application submitted
value.label: Signed and dated version of application submitted

value.fullName: If TRIA is being rejected, signed and dated TRIA notice
value.label: If TRIA is being rejected, signed and dated TRIA notice

value.fullName: Full details of the surplus lines broker, including name, company name, address, license number, state of filing and expiry date.
value.label: Full details of the surplus lines broker, including name, company name, address, license number, state of filing and expiry date.

value.fullName: Currently valued loss runs for past three years showing no prior claims or notices
value.label: Currently valued loss runs for past three years showing no prior claims or notices

value.fullName: Copy of expiring declarations to confirm continuity
value.label: Copy of expiring declarations to confirm continuity

value.fullName: Please provide name and contact info of the person responsible for HR and personnel (need prior to issuing policy)
value.label: Please provide name and contact info of the person responsible for HR and personnel (need prior to issuing policy)
